name: Time Crime
description:
NOTE: The game jam host has been kind enough to allow us to update out submissions. I pushed a patch that fixed some issues (pause menu not working, incorrect tutorial text, camera-shake sometimes not working). If you wish to play the jam submitted version and not the updated one, I've left the old zipped folder below. Thanks for playing!

A 2D Action-Platformer. You're sent to kill a Crimeboss that's been toying with time. You just can't get away with violating some laws, especially the laws of space and time.

A game made in 7 days for the AI and Games Jam.
